signIn.title: Sign in
signIn.description: We'll send to your email a magic link to automatically sign in.
signIn.emailSent: We've sent a magic link to your email. Please check your inbox.

emailSentError.title: Oops!
emailSentError.description: We couldn't send you the link. Please try again later.

signIn.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
signIn.signInWithMagicLink: Sign in with a Magic link
signIn.differentDevice: It seems you opened the link from a different device. Please confirm your email.
